abstract: With ads featuring Michael Strahan, Vaseline Men is aiming to alter perceptions about the use of body lotion.
snippet: With ads featuring Michael Strahan, Vaseline Men is aiming to alter perceptions about the use of body lotion.
lead_paragraph: IN a new television spot for Vaseline Men body and face lotion, Michael Strahan, the former New York Giants defensive end who stars on the Fox series “Brothers,” demonstrates a 15-minute workout in a hotel room, including push-ups and lateral jumps over rolled-up towels. Afterward, Mr. Strahan rubs lotion on his Popeye forearm.

headline.main: For a Men’s Body Lotion, a Rugged Messenger
headline.print_headline: For a Men’s Body Lotion, a Rugged Messenger
